content.prompt: Voltaire’s mockery of the notion of one true religion in the second paragraph of the passage is most directly influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: Protestant challenges to the Catholic Church’s claim of monopoly on religious truth
Ideas of legal equality and individual rights espoused by political theorists such as Locke and Rousseau
Newtonian ideas of a deterministic and mechanistic universe ruled by mathematical laws
Europeans’ deeper awareness of the world’s cultural diversity, gained through scientific exploration and travelers’ accounts

topic.text: 4.7: Causation in the Age of Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment
